Stage.Description: Speak with Julie Bristol (Earth Station, Earth, Sol)

Tree.Text: /happy1 Could you please fetch some grail water for me?
/crazy Ah, Never mind then
/bow Yay! I heard reports the first one is near the Advanced Combat Training Nav in Luna sector.

/give Oh, before I forget here is a Grail affinity device, it'll help you extract the grail waters from the asteroids, and also will allow you to detect Grail water bearing asteroids from a much larger distance.

Stage.Description: Search for Grail water near Advanced Combat Training, Luna Sector, Sol
Return the grail water to Julie Bristol (Earth Station, Earth, Sol)

Tree.Text: /happy1 You have the grail water!
/bow Will you give it to me and find more?
Tree.Branch: Sure, where are the next grails?
I have had enough of this! I'll not run your fool errands.

Tree.Text: /shrug Bah! You had your chance and you blew it.
/gender2 Thankyou! The next waters are in Io Sector, near the Tempest Fringe and in Europa, near The Hunting Grounds.

Stage.Description: Search for Grail water near Tempest Fringe, Io Sector, Sol
Search for Grail water near The Hunting Grounds, Europa Sector, Sol
Return the grail waters to Julie Bristol (Earth Station, Earth, Sol)

Tree.Text: /happy1 Wow, you found them both?
/bow Indeed!
/shrug Of course not! I already have one! Take them to Sander Pauls on ECS Dauntless.

Stage.Description: Take the Grail waters to Sander Pauls (ECS Dauntless, Asteroid Belt Alpha)

Tree.Text: /gender2 Kick! Punch! Its all in the mind!
/disco If you want to test me, I am sure you find, the things I teach ya, are sure to beat ya ...
/robot Nevertheless, you get a lesson from Teacha!
Tree.Branch: Do you want these grails or what?

Tree.Text: /thumbs Yo! Thanks! Just what I needed...
Tree.Branch: No Problem, just call me Grail Boy...

Tree.Text: /bow OK Grail Boy, The next water is right here in this asteroid belt! Look near Toughnut Pit. I entered the locations of the next two in your log.
/happy1 The next water is right here in this asteroid belt! Look near Toughnut Pit. I entered the locations of the next two in your log.

Stage.Description: Search for Grail water near Toughnut Pit, Asteroid Belt Alpha
Search for Grail water near Mining Marker 2, Asteroid Belt Beta Sector
Search for Grail water near Asteroid JP-R15, Jupiter Sector, Sol
Take the Grail waters back to Sander Pauls (ECS Dauntless, Asteroid Belt Alpha)

Tree.Text: /threaten I am the knight who says 'NI!'!
Tree.Branch: Oh no, look do you want these grails?

Tree.Text: /shoot I require that you take these grails to ... Julie Bristol at Detention Centre Onorom!
/point You dare question a knight of Ni? My brothers will be here shortly and we will say 'Ni' again to you ...
/smash Now begone!

Stage.Description: Take the Grail waters to Julie Bristol (Detention Centre Onorom)

Tree.Text: /bored Good grief it's dull here, I hope you've got something good for me...
Tree.Branch: These grail waters, you want them?

Tree.Text: /gender1 Wow! Yeah, those are like, totally amazing.
Tree.Branch: Nice. Do you come here often?

Tree.Text: /bow You bet!
/gender2 Hey! Are you flirting with me? Say how about you come back here when I have some time off and we can go someplace...
Tree.Branch: Sure thing Julie, anything else you need?

Tree.Text: /bow Only one last grail, it's right here in Asteroid belt Gamma! Look between Mier's Perch and Marin34
Tree.Branch: Where do I take this grail water?

Tree.Text: /point You have to take it to Sander Pauls in ECS Dauntless.

Stage.Description: Search for Grail water near Mier's Perch, Asteroid Belt Gamma, Sol
Take the final Grail water to Sander Pauls (ECS Dauntless, Asteroid Belt Alpha)

Tree.Text: /threaten It is you again, what do you want?
Tree.Branch: I have this last grail water.

Tree.Text: /shrug I'm not interested, I already 'ave one, it's-a very nice!
Tree.Branch: Look here my good man, I've come all this way...

Tree.Text: /mime I'm stuck in this box!! Look!! ARGH!!
Tree.Branch: -Sigh-, Do you want this grail water or not?

Tree.Text: /point Look at you, how you've been running about knees bent doing our bidding, you son of a silly person! I'll take your grail water, but don't think you're doing me any favours-a!

/happy1 Hey I'm just kidding you, you've done a fantastic job, now Julie and I can have clean underwear (we only wash them in grail water), and Julie's sis can feed her cat, which only drinks grail water.
/bow You're a credit to your species, which ever one it is... Come back later, and I will taunt you a second time!

Stage.Description: Speak with Meredith Lot (Joves Fury, Jupiter, Sol)

Tree.Text: /point Hey! You're ready for your next hull upgrade, would you like to upgrade?
/crazy Ah, Never mind then...
/bow First would you please bring me 3 Angry Blue Gaze weapons.
/happy1 Once I have those, I will assign your new hull to be upgraded.

Stage.Description: Bring 3 Angry Blue Gaze to Meredith Lot for Hull upgrade (Joves Fury, Jupiter, Sol)

Tree.Text: /bow Thankyou, just what I needed! I hope the new hull strength helps you.

Stage.Description: Speak with Meredith Lot (Joves Fury, Jupiter, Sol)

Tree.Text: /point Hey! You're ready for your next hull upgrade, would you like to upgrade?
/crazy Ah, Never mind then...
/bow First would you please bring me a Black Dragonplate Shield.
/happy1 Once I have those, I will assign your new hull to be upgraded.

Stage.Description: Bring Black Dragonplate shield to Meredith Lot for Hull upgrade (Joves Fury, Jupiter, Sol)

Tree.Text: /bow Thankyou, just what I needed! I hope the new hull upgrade helps you.

Mission.Name: Scan wreckages Mission
Mission.Summary: Scan the wreckages around Joves City

Stage.Description: Speak with Meredith Lot (Joves Fury, Jupiter, Sol)

Tree.Text: /point You! Just the person, I see you've achieved the requirements for a new hull, would you like to upgrade your hull?
/crazy Ah, Never mind then...
/bow First I require all 8 wreckages around Joves City Ruins to be scanned for zeta particles.
/happy1 Once you've scanned all 8 ruins report back to me and I will assign your new hull to be upgraded.

Stage.Description: Scan the 8 ship wreckages around Joves City, Jupiter, Sol
Return to Meredith Lot for Hull upgrade (Joves Fury, Jupiter, Sol)

Tree.Text: /bow Well done, your research assistance has been invaluable, you should find your new hull in order after you leave the station.

Mission.Name: Find and scan hidden RD base

Stage.Description: Speak with Meredith Lot (Joves Fury, Jupiter, Sol)

Tree.Text: /point Hi! Just the person, I've heard reports of interesting activity in this sector and I need someone to investigate. Are you interested?
/gender2 Never mind then
/happy1 OK, the strange reports detail that none other than the Red Dragons have set up a base here in Jupiter sector...
/point I need you to go and scan the RD base. Once you have scanned it can you return here at once and show me the data.

Stage.Description: Scan the Red Dragon Outpost, Jupiter, Sol
Return to Meredith Lot with scan info (Joves Fury, Jupiter, Sol)

Tree.Text: /bow Thankyou. Very interesting. The Dragons influence is increasing, and they are getting too powerful here. We may need to cull them a little. Can you find and destroy 2 Red Dragon Patrol fighters, then you should be ready for your hull upgrade.
/point Also, grouping to fight the Patrol is OK, but the person doing the mission must finish off the fighter. Do not bother reporting this as a bug because it's not implemented yet.

Stage.Description: Find and destroy 2 Red Dragon Patrol fighters in the sector (Jupiter, Sol)
Return to Meredith Lot for Hull upgrade (Joves Fury, Jupiter, Sol)

Tree.Text: /bow Well done, your efforts should ensure that the sector stays in it's rightful hands, you should find your new hull in order after you leave the station.
